data.title: Kristof Santy: La Grande Bouffe
data.meta_description: Influenced by a fascination with food and its history, La Grande Bouffe (The Big Feast), draws its name from the satirical 1970s French cult film directed by Marco Ferreri and explores themes of everyday gastronomy.
